title: Paulina Porizkova Doesn’t Call Her Book a Memoir
description: The model and author spoke about writing “No Filter: The Good, the Bad and the Beautiful.”
dc:creator: Rhonda Garelick
category: No Filter: The Good, the Bad and the Beautiful (Book)
media:credit: Adeline Lulo for The New York Times
media:description: “I’ve carried so much shame through my life. For everything,” Paulina Porizkova said. “For being pretty, or not pretty enough. For having money when I didn’t deserve that much money. For not being the child my parents wanted. Everything in my life, I’ve been ashamed of.”
